headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' js.stripe.com embed.tawk.to va.tawk.to; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' *.tawk.to *.stripe.com formsubmit.co; frame-src js.stripe.com checkout.stripe.com *.tawk.to; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'
